sentence.Network_en: Her hired car was found abandoned at Beachy Head.

sentence.Network_en: The night we went to Birmingham by way of Beachy Head.

sentence.Network_en: The incident happened at Beachy Head -- a spot on England's south coast notorious for suicides.
sentence.Network_cn: 这起事件发生在英国的比奇角 -- 英格兰南部海岸著名的“自杀胜地”.
